Stafford Gambit

Mar 24, 2025

The Stafford Gambit is an aggressive line for black in the Petrov Defense and begins with the moves:

  1. e4 e5
  2. Nf3 Nf6
  3. Nxe5 Nc6 The accepted line continues with:
